headline: People and environment are ok. Management is not skilled in IT and are not compitant.
pros:
Environment is ok.
Employees are good people.
cons:
Management is poor. 
Pay is under average for experience and work requested.

headline: Affiliated Bank review
pros: Quickly growing bank with new ambitious ownership

headline: Popularity Contest
pros: Get hired on easily. Since this bank is practically unknown nobody ever applies or interviews.
cons: They hired me easily with several broken promises of learning and taking on more task to advance. Also if the head of deposits doesn't like you for whatever reason, you will be gone.  Tons of racism and what appears to be money laundering with no holds on deposits.

headline: Great company that takes care of their employees!
pros: They take good care of their employees. They make it easy to enjoy coming to work everyday.  Decent compensation, could be better but they give yearly raises.
cons:
Very limited training. One person is responsible for tasks that normally would have multiple different people or positions for. The higher ups tend to have the "better than you" attitude. There is definitely a power struggle within the company. 
Not much room to grow within the company. Little room for advancement.

headline: Not too bad
pros: Convenient, Staff is fun, Bank President is nice, PTO
cons: Unorganized, no room for growth, "corporate" is a little unorganized

headline: Decent
pros: Decent job to work while you're in college. You might get the opportunity to move up, however its not that much of an increase in pay, maybe a few dollars an hour.
cons: This position requires a lot of tedious work. Scanning, filing, sorting through paperwork. The process could be much more efficient with proper management.

headline: analyst
cons: Environment good, lot of people to work with

headline: Great place to work
pros: Affiliated Bank is a community Bank that treats their employees like family. They truly care about everyone's well being and success.
cons: Affiliated Bank is a community Bank that at times forgets that they aren't the only option for employees and will expect more than is reasonable.

headline: sales exec
cons: not so good  to work for

headline: Good company
pros: Good office in general and good people to work with
cons: None that I can think of
